about.description: I currently work as a full-stack freelance developer at Guru.com. Over the years, I've made quite a few websites, everything from small business sites to mid-high volume media sites.

contacts.message: Reach out at the email above and share some basic info about your project, budget, and timeline. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
